item.title: So women don't play RS huh?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:48, topic:525006”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=643698.msg4347071#msg4347071 date=1376046752]

I have to admit sadly, is better than me in a lot of FPS games (CoD, Halo, etc).

I love how you can specify a gender as playing a role in this

And on topic, the thread title is stupid. People like you carrying on about females playing games is beyond moronic. While I despise the self loathing slags that hop on their brother’s xbox and carry on being brainless in everyone’s ears, the target audience of games are not gender specific and drooling over girls online makes you look heavily desperate.

something something sexist comment
[/quote]
Well, typically a women that plays (and yes, I do know some) isn’t good at shooters. I’m not shitty myself, actually, on average days I’m the person that carries my team.
Wait…
Wait. You said the target audience of games isn’t specific?
From what my old teacher told me, and those people that come to your school to try and get you to go to their college (sorry I’m tired and my head isn’t on right), they normally target the female gender when they make games. Why else do you think there’s some male action hero in all the games, who is all big and strong and has to save the day?
Male target audience:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRfroCeDk2E[/youtube]

Female target audience:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=blW40AVWXrE[/youtube]

Notice, the “hot sexy blonde with ginormous tits” in the first video. Is that not what most men want?
Now, I know that you never actually see Master Chiefs face or anything (and he was ‘hyper aged’ from like 12 lol). But he’s some “big strong man” that has all the skills to save the day, over and over.[/quote]
if halo really is a female targeted game then from experience i guarantee its not working well

Read full topic
item.source: So women don't play RS huh?

item.title: So women don't play RS huh?

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Java-RSPS-Noob:

oh is that why certain…um…sites… have females as the interviewers…

Yes, exactly. It’s to target men, because what man doesn’t want to see some fine girl talk about a game?

Read full topic

Wait. You said the target audience of games isn’t specific?
From what my old teacher told me, and those people that come to your school to try and get you to go to their college (sorry I’m tired and my head isn’t on right), they normally target the female gender when they make games. item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Lin:

I hate most women gamers because they get so much attention and sympathy. They always suck in one way or another (shut up). Maybe if it was possible to engage with one without being in a meatfest, they would be feasible. However, topics like this are why I purposely avoid them.

Oh my god so much this.
I’ve got a few chick friends on XBL, and I’m pretty sure they only added me because I wasn’t trying to ride their invisible cocks the entire games I did play with them, one of them on my list, I have to admit sadly, is better than me in a lot of FPS games (CoD, Halo, etc).

item.title: So women don't play RS huh?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

When I was in the sixth grade there was a cute girl who I had a crush on who played RuneScape. She had a phone but I didn’t, so I asked for her RuneScape name and she gave me it. It was probably the bravest thing I did.

Looking back at it, I can see why she never replied back to me in the game.

lol.

Read full topic

If I ever find the video I’ll show you guys lol.[/quote]omg you have to link me to that in a pm when you find it! haha going to be bookmarked

item.title: So women don't play RS huh?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

amy_webb:

Why does everyone assume girl gamers want the attention they get? It is like womens liberation movements all over again, we want to be treated fairly and we get treated like we are incompetent. Girls going around flaunting themselves puts other girl gamers down, we are there to play not there to model.

To be fair Amy… my ex asked me how to turn on the stove LOL

[hr]

Why can’t you girls model AND play? It would make the game itself 10000 x better.

Read full topic

Girls going around flaunting themselves puts other girl gamers down, we are there to play not there to model.

item.title: So women don't play RS huh?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Normally, I’d agree.
Right now, I don’t feel normal.
Let me be an asshole, ok?

If she made all that shit herself, bravo. But I can’t help but think she whored around to get people to donate it to her.
As for the guys sliming around her, it’s a fucking sad thing to see. I don’t mind people flirting and fucking the next minute but come on… That’s like saying “oh you look nice, do you need money?” irl. Fuck that.

Read full topic
